member.name: P:C1.Web.Calendar.C1WebCalendar.CalendarTitle
member.summary: Determines the string that displays on calendar title.
member.remarks:
CalenderTitle is the group tile shared by all the month views. To change the title for month views, you have to use MonthViewTitle property.
The title string can be any string or string that has date formatting parameters.
At most four parameters are accepted, each can has its own data format. They are: {0} - The value of DiaplayDate. {1} - The first month of month views, when multiple monthes are displayed. {2} - The last month of month views, when multiple monthes are displayed. {3} - The number of month views, when multiple monthes are displayed.
For example: "Schedule of {0:MMMM yyyy}". "{1:MMMM yyyy} to {2:MMMM yyyy}"

member.name: P:C1.Web.Calendar.C1WebCalendar.DayTemplates
member.summary: Gets the template collection.
member.remarks:
C1WebCalendar supports hosting templates in calendar day cells.
To add template controls, you have to: 1. Click the ellipsis button right beside the DayTemplates in property grid to open the DayTemplates collection editor. 2. Add template to this collection, give proper ID. 3. Select "Edit Templates" in smart tag.
To "bind" template to a calendar day, you have to: 1. Click the ellipsis button right beside the CustomDays in property grid. 2. Add CustomDay in this collection. 3. Specify the TemplateID and Date property. The TemplateID should be the ID of template added in the above steps.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType
member.summary: Determines the transition effects applying to popup window.
member.remarks: DirectX transition only works under IE after vesion 5.5. Please see http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms673540.aspx for more informations.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.None
member.summary: No transition effect.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Dissolve
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object by exposing random pixels.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Fade
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object by fading out the original content.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Iriscircle
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect. (irisStyle=CIRCLE)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Iriscirclein
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect. (irisStyle=CIRCLE,motion=in)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Iriscross
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect. (irisStyle=CROSS)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Iriscrossin
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect.(irisStyle=CROSS,motion=in)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Irisdiamond
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect. (irisStyle=DIAMOND)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Irisdiamondin
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect.(irisStyle=DIAMOND,motion=in)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Irisplus
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect. (irisStyle=PLUS)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Irisplusin
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect.(irisStyle=PLUS,motion=in)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Irissquare
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect. (irisStyle=SQUARE)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Irissquarein
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect. (irisStyle=SQUARE,motion=in)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Irisstar
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect. (irisStyle=STAR)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Irisstarin
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with an iris effect. (irisStyle=STAR,motion=in)

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Pixelate
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object by fading out the original content.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Wheel2
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with a rotating motion, like spokes of a wheel covering the original content.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Wheel8
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with a rotating motion, like spokes of a wheel covering the original content.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Wipedown
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with a radial wipe. Down direction.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Wipeleft
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with a radial wipe. Left direction.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Wiperight
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with a radial wipe. Right direction.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.TransitionType.Wipeup
member.summary: Reveals new content of the object with a radial wipe. Up direction.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Calendar.DockType
member.summary: Determines the popup calendar's alignment to its buddy control.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.DockType.LeftTop
member.summary: Pops up the calendar to the left side of the buddy control, with the top margin in the same line.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.DockType.LeftBottom
member.summary: Pops up the calendar to the left side of the buddy control, with the bottom margin in the same line.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.DockType.TopLeft
member.summary: Pops up the calendar to the top side of the buddy control, with the left margin in the same line.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.DockType.TopRight
member.summary: Pops up the calendar to the top side of the buddy control, with the right margin in the same line.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.DockType.RightTop
member.summary: Pops up the calendar to the right side of the buddy control, with the top margin in the same line.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.DockType.RightBottom
member.summary: Pops up the calendar to the right side of the buddy control, with the bottom margin in the same line.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.DockType.BottomLeft
member.summary: Pops up the calendar to the bottom side of the buddy control, with the left margin in the same line.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.DockType.BottomRight
member.summary: Pops up the calendar to the bottom side of the buddy control, with the left margin in the same line.

member.summary: Displays the day in month. Single-digit days will not have a leading zero.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Calendar.MonthDayFormat.ZeroPadding
member.summary: Displays the day in month. Single-digit days will not have a leading zero.
